doc.author: Samer Deeb (@samerd)
description: This module provides declarative management of LLDP service configuration on Mellanox ONYX network devices.
State of the LLDP protocol configuration.

doc.short_description: Manage LLDP configuration on Mellanox ONYX network devices

mellanox.onyx.onyx_lldp.examples:
- name: Enable LLDP protocol
  onyx_lldp:
    state: present

- name: Disable LLDP protocol
  onyx_lldp:
    state: lldp

commands.description: The list of configuration mode commands to send to the device
